name: Liar Lair
description: You are a pizza delivery driver just out to do your job, or so you thought anyways. The game starts by you falling through to a cavern below once you get to the delivery site. A mysterious voice talks to you and offers to help you to escape and complete your pizza delivery. Do you listen to the voice? Do you really have a choice? Explore with your handy dandy pizza launcher to see what "lies" deep within this lair.
